page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT cont
page.content: The average length of time lived in the area by each adult. Males:18 years Females:21 years ______________________________________ Originations ______________ Out of twenty_five people 16 people came from the locality; 4 people came from outside Cumbria; 5 people came from overseas,(ethnic type European). ______________________________________ Places of employment ______________________ Out of the 25 people 14 were employed in places of work as follows: Plumpton |7 | Kirby Thore |1 | Armathwaite |1 | Skelton |1 | Penrith |2 | Carlisle |2 |
